700992f-a.text:
Echo Park (Bronx): An early view of the small park on the west side of Valentine Avenue, between East Tremont and East Turnside Avenues. The property was once owned by James Puckhout (1879-1885).
Gift of Mott Haven Library
about 1900
700992f-a.folder: Valentine Avenue & Tremont Avenue (East), Bronx, NY
